summary: The video showcases a new effect for Palestine, likely a digital overlay or filter, which users can apply to their videos. The voice-over explains that viewers can post one video per day using this effect, and it will count towards a tally. The speaker mentions that posting once each weekday (Monday through Friday) will accumulate to five counts, emphasizing the frequency and consistency required to utilize the feature effectively.
keywords: Palestine, new effect, video filter, daily posts, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, count, tally, consistency
